subject: RE: [junit] Unable to accumulate failures within  a testcase
msgSnippet: As is described in the JUnit documentation, the first failure of an assert terminates the test case method. If you have multiple tests that you wish to ensure
messageBody:
As is described in the JUnit documentation, the first failure of an assert
terminates the test case method. If you have multiple tests that you wish to
ensure run when you run the test, put them in separate methods. Each test
method will be run regardless of the success or failure of the other test
methods.

M. Erik Husby
